creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Hardcover bound volume, fabric patch with text and "DISPLAY COPY" label adhered to black hardcover; 136 pp.

title: I Could Tell You But Then You Would Have To Be Destroyed By Me
